entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 7 except plus 3 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Showers ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Flurries over the Highlands. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High 7 except plus 3 over the Highlands. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1 except minus 5 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1 except minus 5 over the Highlands. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 14 except 8 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
